column5: Grant Hill 1999-00 Topps Highlight Reels #HR7 Detroit Pistons
column47:
Grant Hill 1999-00 Topps Highlight Reels #HR7   Detroit Pistons Card


The images shown are of the actual card you will receive unless this is a quantity listing. If the title appears incorrect or mismatched, please message us. The card pictured is always the one that ships.


MULTIPLE QUANTITY LISTINGS:

If multiple copies are available, we show the worst-conditioned card in the images so you can be confident in what you’ll receive. The card in the scan is always shipped last to ensure others receive better copies.


WHO WE ARE:

Monterey Sports Cards is a father-and-son operation. My 10-year-old and I work together to list cards in the kind of condition we’d want to receive ourselves. If a card is too beat up, it goes in our personal stash or a low-grade lot except for pre-1980 cards, which are listed regardless of wear.


PACKAGING:

All cards are stored in penny sleeves, then shipped in Top Loaders or Card Savers, sealed inside a Team Bag. If you prefer one holder type over the other, just leave a note at checkout.


✔️ FAST SHIPPING  

✔️ TRUSTED FAMILY SELLER

column5: Austin Reaves 2023-24 Donruss Optic Hyper Pink #160 Los Angeles Lakers
column47:
Austin Reaves 2023-24 Donruss Optic Hyper Pink #160   Los Angeles Lakers Card


The images shown are of the actual card you will receive unless this is a quantity listing. If the title appears incorrect or mismatched, please message us. The card pictured is always the one that ships.


MULTIPLE QUANTITY LISTINGS:

If multiple copies are available, we show the worst-conditioned card in the images so you can be confident in what you’ll receive. The card in the scan is always shipped last to ensure others receive better copies.


WHO WE ARE:

Monterey Sports Cards is a father-and-son operation. My 10-year-old and I work together to list cards in the kind of condition we’d want to receive ourselves. If a card is too beat up, it goes in our personal stash or a low-grade lot except for pre-1980 cards, which are listed regardless of wear.


PACKAGING:

All cards are stored in penny sleeves, then shipped in Top Loaders or Card Savers, sealed inside a Team Bag. If you prefer one holder type over the other, just leave a note at checkout.
